name: Kshitij Shingare
title: Full Stack Developer — Web Applications & AI Integration
summary: Information Technology undergraduate with hands-on experience building full-stack web applications. Passionate about creating modern, scalable solutions using cutting-edge technologies. Skilled in React.js, Node.js, Express.js, and database management. Enthusiastic about AI integration and delivering seamless user experiences.

highlights: Developed and maintained full-stack web applications using React.js and Node.js
Integrated RESTful APIs to streamline data flow between frontend and backend
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver features on schedule
Optimized application performance and improved page load times by 40%

projects.name: Interactive Resume Website
projects.description: A modern, responsive personal resume website with dark/light theme toggle and GitHub contribution graph.

projects.name: Full Stack Web Application
